ygData.subject: Re: Questions about the latest nerfing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The fact that 3 of our songs didn t work at all when they first put them in (all the chants) leads me to believe that not even their testers don t play
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Sep 14/99, kim@... wrote:
>
> That's a good point. I know Aria of Eagles suffers from the
> same problem (overriding the levitate spell), and Aquatic Ayre
> probably does as well. That they're concentrating only on the
> SoW fix really makes me wonder if anyone who works there even
> plays a bard.

The fact that 3 of our songs didn't work at all when they first put them
in (all the chants) leads me to believe that not even their testers
don't play bards. Someone obviously tested them by targetting
themselves, because that's the only thing they worked on for over a
month.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
